web.undergraduate: The course you want is B.S.C honours Computer Science Web and Internet Management. You can enrol on Computer Science, and take this course by choosing web options
web.postgraduate: The course you want is M. S. C. Computer Science Software Engineering. It has modules on web you can take

software development.undergraduate: The course you want is B.S.C. honours Computer Science Software Development. You can specialise in programming languages. You can enrol on Computer Science, and take this course by choosing software development options
